name: Wind

name: SuperDARN
comment_data: velocity, backscattered power at various locations; convection maps given global electrostatic potential (can give vectors too)

name: THEMIS
comment_data: 5 spacecraft THEMIS A-E; magnetic field, plasma

name: SuperMAG indices
comment_data: SMR, SMR LT, SME, SME MLAT, SME MLT, SMU, SML

name: SuperMAG magnetometers
comment_data: number of magnetometers increases with time

name: MagIE
comment_data: stations across Ireland: Valentia and Armagh long running, Dunsink and Birr newer; N/E/Z, B, dBdt, K

name: GOES 1-18
comment_data: Xray flux at different wavelength, protons, magnetometer

name: Auroral Electrojet indices
comment_data: AU, AL, AE, AO; hourly AE since 1957,

name: OMNI hourly / daily
comment_data: includes space and ground based stuff

name: OMNI minute
comment_data: includes space and ground based stuff

name: SYM-H
comment_dates: ongoing if accessed from Kyoto directly

name: ACE

name: Geotail

name: AMPERE
